header_text: A few days after an argument with your friend, you decide to break the ice by asking them to come over for dinner. You get ready, and as you are about to leave, they call to say they can't make it after all. As you hang up, you think that this is because they are feeling exhausted.

elements.Text: Your friend cancelled the meeting because they are...
